entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 1:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -28.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %

Dewpoint: -33.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
